TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ManagementMemberAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public MustInherit Class ManagementMemberAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ManagementMemberAttribute abstract : Attribute

Docs.summary: This class is used by the WMI.NET Provider Extensions framework. It is the base class for all the management attributes that can be applied to members. Note: the WMI .NET libraries are now considered in final state, and no further development, enhancements, or updates will be available for non-security related issues affecting these libraries. The [MI APIs](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/jj152383%28v=vs.80%29.aspx) should be used for all new development.

remarks.format: ## Remarks O parâmetro de nome da classe pai garante que todos os atributos de gerenciamento que se aplicam aos membros aceitam um parâmetro de nome.

Docs.value: Retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que é o nome do atributo de gerenciamento.
